solutions.introTitle: Built to Increase Your Car Rental Bookings
solutions.introDescription: Everything your agency needs to respond faster, convert more, and operate smarter.
solutions.title: Meet Botwise. Built to increase your car rental bookings.
solutions.description: Botwise is an AI agent that handles your entire booking conversation automatically — from first message to confirmed reservation.

howItWorks.title: In 3 Simple Steps
howItWorks.description: Deploy your AI booking agent in days — not months.

step1.title: Connect Your Agency
step1.description: We integrate Botwise with your website, WhatsApp, and booking workflow. No technical complexity.

step2.title: Train Your AI Agent
step2.description: We configure your vehicles, pricing rules, availability logic, and qualification criteria. Your AI learns how your agency operates.

step3.title: Start Capturing Bookings 24/7
step3.description: Your AI responds instantly, qualifies renters, checks availability, and sends confirmed booking requests directly to your team.

analytics.title: Track Every Conversation. Measure Every Booking.
analytics.description: Get real-time visibility into inquiries, qualified renters, and confirmed bookings — all in one powerful dashboard.
